rules.description: Remap Cmd+Tab to disable default app switcher and use Alfred instead
System Modifications - Caps Lock to Hyper Key with Escape on tap

manipulators.description: Shift + Caps Lock enables actual Caps Lock
Caps Lock to Hyper Key (Right Shift + Right Cmd + Right Ctrl + Right Option), Escape on tap

rules.description: Screenshot Shortcuts - Custom paths to Proton Sync directory

manipulators.description: Cmd + Shift + 3: Full screen screenshot to Proton Sync
Cmd + Ctrl + Shift + 3: Full screen screenshot to clipboard
Cmd + Shift + 4: Selection screenshot to Proton Sync
Cmd + Ctrl + Shift + 4: Selection screenshot to clipboard

rules.description: Hyper Key - System Navigation and Controls

manipulators.description: Hyper + N: Move to space left
Hyper + M: Move to space right
Hyper + F: Open default application launcher
Hyper + E: Open default editor (VS Code)
Hyper + u in Obsidian/Zen move one tab left
Hyper + i in Obsidian/Zen move one tab right
Beeper: Hyper + U move up conversation (Cmd+Option+Up)
Beeper: Hyper + I move down conversation (Cmd+Option+Down)
Signal: Hyper + U move up conversation (Option+Up)
Signal: Hyper + I move down conversation (Option+Down)
Signal: Cmd + E archives current chat and moves to next
Signal: Cmd + K starts new chat (Cmd+N)
Signal: Cmd + Shift + Enter quick send sequence
Disable Escape as exit fullscreen in Safari

rules.description: Hyper Key - Default Tab and Window Navigation
